hero.title: We connect travelers... everywhere in the world
hero.subtitle: At SimWeGo, every traveler can activate their eSIM with one click, and every business can offer this seamless experience to their customers.

founders.title: Two founders, one vision born from travel
founders.description: Behind SimWeGo, there are two former high-level athletes who have spent a large part of their lives traveling to the four corners of the world. International competitions, training abroad, stays around the globe.
founders.quote: Our journeys taught us to live permanently between two planes, two cultures and two networks.

performance.title: Performance
performance.description: Inherited from sport, where every detail matters.

simplicity.title: Simplicity
simplicity.description: A smooth experience, without jargon or hidden fees.

teamSpirit.title: Team Spirit
teamSpirit.description: Like in sport, we move forward together and create shared value with our partners.

mission.title: Simple connectivity today. Universal tomorrow.
mission.description: Our mission is clear: make travel connectivity smooth and fair, everywhere in the world.

contactUs.contactInfo: For all inquiries, please email us using the form below. Our team is there for you 24/7!

contactUs.noFaqsMessage: We couldn't find any FAQs right now. If you have questions, feel free to contact us!

hero.title: Boost Your Customers' Experience with eSIM
hero.subtitle: Offer your travelers instant and seamless mobile connectivity in +220 destinations.

problems.title: Today, travelers want to be connected upon arrival — but current solutions disappoint.

unreliable.title: Unreliable
unreliable.description: Public Wi-Fi: convenient for you, perfect for hackers.

expensive.title: Too Expensive
expensive.description: Posting a selfie for €60? That's the price of forgetting your eSIM.

complex.title: Too Complex
complex.description: Spending 1 hour for a SIM? eSIM takes 10 seconds.

roaming.title: Expensive roaming, frustrating user experiences... Your customers deserve better!
roaming.description: Give your customers the ability to purchase and activate data plans directly through your app or website. We provide the technology, webstore, connectivity, and support.

solutions.title: Our Partnership Solutions

api.title: API Integration
api.description: Integrate eSIM plan sales directly into your existing mobile application

whiteLabel.title: White Label Solution
whiteLabel.description: Webstore and/or iOS/Android apps provided by SimWeGo, branded with your colors, integrable into your site

affiliate.title: Affiliate Program
affiliate.description: Earn commissions by recommending SimWeGo to your customers through our partner program

solutions.conclusion: Choose the solution that best fits your needs and start offering your customers an unparalleled connectivity experience.

benefits.title: A solution designed for you... and your customers

experience.title: Enhance Your Customers' Experience
experience.description: Improve your customers' experience from the moment they arrive at their destination.

integration.title: Simple and Quick Integration
integration.description: Simple and quick integration with no technical constraints.

positioning.title: Strengthen Your Positioning
positioning.description: Strengthen your positioning with an innovative digital service.

revenue.title: A New Revenue Stream
revenue.description: A new revenue stream with no operational management required.
